item.description:
Hi Trailblazers, we will be joining Munib at his beautiful home (in Topsfield, Ma) on the water for a "Pajama Party". Ever been to one before? Well, bring your favorite pajamas or bathrobe and join everyone for a fun party of board games, laughter, food and socializing.

We will have a potluck dinner, so bring something to share!

We will also be having an optional Christmas Yankee Swap. Max of $15. Let's have some fun with this--kitschy, unusual, creative is great!

Other meetup groups will be joining us, so sign up early for this fun Holiday party!

Bring a good board game to share with others! And maybe an extra chair if you have one.

Munib's house address will be emailed the night before the event starts, so you will know where his house is. If you use a GPS it may bring you to the gas station down the road, so look for the Tiki torch at the end of his gravel driveway to identify where his road is.

If anyone gets lost or wants more information about the party my number is:603-312-6735

See you there!

Peter

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Pajama / Bathrobe Party
